010package imagingbook.common.color.colorspace;
011
012import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
013
014import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
015
016/**
017 * This class implements a D65-based sRGBcolor space without performing
018 * chromatic adaptation between D50 and D65, as required by Java's profile 
019 * connection space. Everything is D65, components of all {@code float[]} colors
020 * are supposed to be in [0,1].
021 * 
022 */
023@SuppressWarnings("serial")
024public class sRgb65ColorSpace extends ColorSpace {
025        
026        /** Matrix for conversion from linear RGB to XYZ. */
027        public static final double[][] Mrgb =    // (R,G,B) = Mrgb * (X,Y,Z)   // Poynton (ITU 709) 
028                {{3.240479, -1.537150, -0.498535},
029                 {-0.969256, 1.875992, 0.041556},
030                 {0.055648, -0.204043, 1.057311}};
031        
032        /** Matrix for conversion from XYZ to linear RGB (inverse of {@link #Mrgb}). 
033         * The actual inverse is calculated here for better accuracy. 
034         */
035        public static final double[][] Mrgbi = Matrix.inverse(Mrgb);
036        
037//      public static final double[][] Mrgbi =    // (X,Y,Z) = Mrgbi * (R,G,B)   // Poynton (ITU 709) 
038//              {{0.412453, 0.357580, 0.180423},
039//               {0.212671, 0.715160, 0.072169},
040//               {0.019334, 0.119193, 0.950227}};
041
042        /**
043         * Constructor.
044         */
045        public sRgb65ColorSpace() {
046                super(ColorSpace.TYPE_RGB, 3);
047        }
048
049        // XYZ (D65) -> sRGB conversion
050        @Override
051        public float[] fromCIEXYZ(float[] xyz) {
052                double[] rgb = Matrix.multiply(Mrgb, Matrix.toDouble(xyz));             
053                float[] srgb = new float[3];
054                for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
055                        srgb[i] = (float) sRgbUtil.gammaFwd(rgb[i]);
056                }
057                return srgb;
058        }
059        
060        @Override
061        public float[] fromRGB(float[] srgb) {
062                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
063//              return srgb;
064        }
065
066        // sRGB -> XYZ (D65) conversion
067        @Override
068        public float[] toCIEXYZ(float[] srgb) {
069                // get linear rgb components:
070                double[] rgb = new double[3];
071                for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
072                        rgb[i] = sRgbUtil.gammaInv(srgb[i]);
073                }
074                // convert to XYZ (Poynton / ITU 709) 
075                double[] xyz = Matrix.multiply(Mrgbi, rgb);
076                return Matrix.toFloat(xyz);
077        }
078
079        @Override
080        public float[] toRGB(float[] srgb) {
081                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
082//              return srgb;
083        }
084
085}
